ValidationRule.description: (Defect: 14583) Before sending out an email like IR, Restore, (Temp) Sol Prov. A CIR must first be qualified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Parent.Status, 'Pending Customer'), Parent.CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, OR( ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Initial Response'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Restoration'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Temporary Solution Provided'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Solution Provided'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Cause Analysis Report'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c, 'Service Disruption Report') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Prior to sending out a new email, the existing CIR needs to be qualified. The Email Type 'Update' can be used.
